presentation.title: Faculty of Sciences
presentation.subtitle: A center of excellence for higher education and scientific research in Madagascar
presentation.heading: Academic excellence and innovation
presentation.paragraph1: For over 60 years, the Faculty of Sciences of the University of Antananarivo has been training future scientists and researchers of Madagascar. We offer excellence programs in {count} specialized fields.
presentation.paragraph2: Our commitment to teaching quality and cutting-edge research positions us as a key player in the scientific and technological development of the region.
